titleStmt.title: Elisha his lamentation, for his owne, and all Israels losse, in Elijah The subiect of a sermon, preached at the funeralls of the Right Worshipfull Sir Anthony Rous, late of Halton in Cornwall, Knight. By Charles Fitz-Geffry.
titleStmt.author: Fitz-Geffry, Charles, 1575?-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Stansby for Iohn Parker, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the three Pidgeons,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
